description: AUTO-DISCOVERY: Get real working scene examples from demo_1_ai_generated_scenes.py. Returns actual runnable code for 6 different scene types (tower stacking, container filling, etc.). Pure MOP - reads from actual demo file!

example_name.description: Optional: Get specific example (e.g., 'tower_stacking'). Omit to get all examples.

returns.examples: object mapping example names to their code and descriptions
returns.summary: object with example count and list of names

workflow_hints.when_to_use: After understanding available assets/behaviors/relations, look at real working examples to learn coding patterns

examples.output_summary: Returns 6 complete scene examples showing different techniques (stacking, containers, sorting, etc.)
examples.use_case: To learn ExperimentOps API patterns by seeing real working code

best_practices: Study these examples to understand proper scene creation patterns before writing your own scripts
Follow the code style and structure shown in examples
